Summary: I saw a light in the sky that stood for about 10 seconds. Then there was a flash of lightning, and it disappeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving home I saw a light in the sky. It stood there for about 10 seconds, while I fumbled to get the camera on my phone working. In an instant, there was a bolt of lightning, and the next thing I knew the light was gone.I did not get my picture, but it was about the size of an average star (when viewed in our sky), and it was just a dot of light, however it was in front of a dark cloud and stationary, so it could not have been a star or a plane.
